about_the_game: Re-live the beautiful days in Europe by flipping through the pages of our unique and eclectic artbook for "My Girlfriend is a Musician". Featuring art used in the game, this is a must for anyone who enjoyed this journey.
detailed_description: Re-live the beautiful days in Europe by flipping through the pages of our unique and eclectic artbook for "My Girlfriend is a Musician". Featuring art used in the game, this is a must for anyone who enjoyed this journey.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 - 10.13
  • Processor: 1.5GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
